inclusion.criterion: Patients undergoing a single renal transplant from deceased or living donor
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Capable of understanding the purposes of the study, has given written informed consent, and agrees to comply with the study requirements
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women of child bearing age should have a negative serum pregnancy test
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients receiving immunosuppressive therapy within the preceding 28 days for first transplant and 3 months for the second transplant
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of malignancy in the last 5 years except successfully treated localized non-melanoma skin cancer
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: HIV, hepatitis B virus (HBV), or hepatitis C virus (HCV) positive serology
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Loss of previous transplant in < 1 year
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of systemic mastocytosis with flares, but is otherwise healthy and capable of understanding study requirements. However, she failed an aspirin challenge due to adverse reaction.
